author: Lesley Waters
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan. Add the garlic, shallot and curry paste and fry for 2 minutes. Add the potato and thyme and fry for a further 2 minutes. Season well, then add the eggs and coriander. Stir together and cook for 4 minutes. To serve, turn the tortilla out on to a warm plate and sprinkle with chopped coriander.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  1 clove garlic, finely chopped,  1 shallot, finely chopped,  2 tbsp ready-made Thai green curry paste,  150g/5Â½oz new potatoes, finely chopped and blanched,  1 tsp chopped thyme leaves ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  3 free-range eggs, beaten,  2 tbsp chopped coriander leaves, plus extra leaves to garnish
